forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 63. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, San Francisco drapes itself in a gentle shroud of cloud cover, offering a whisper of moisture on the cusp of dawn. The air is cool and carries the flavors of the Pacific, promising a day where drizzle may sporadically greet the sun before it breaks free from the coastal tendrils of a marine layer. As the hours unfold, expect a transformation from somber gray to playful patches of blue, with a high near 63, underlining the city’s flirtation with the light. The westerly winds, nimble and soft, will carry the scent of the sea, wrapping around the iconic hills and reminding us of nature’s most delicate cadence.

For those venturing into the streets of this eclectic metropolis, layering is essential. A light jacket or sweater will offer solace against the lingering chill of the morning, while the afternoon may invite a more casual attire as the sun reveals itself. Take a moment to stroll through the lesser-trodden corners of the city, perhaps winding through the quaint enclaves of the Mission District or lingering over a coffee in one of the myriad cafés that beckon with warmth and comfort. As the day unfolds, let the allure of the unexpected guide your wanderings, for each step through the city’s vibrant heart is an invitation to uncover its ever-evolving charm.
